entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
